website_summaries.verdict: An effective whitening gel that is sticky, and will stay on your teeth just like a whitening strip. However, you will get better results.
pros: Apply to your pre-existing teeth whitening trays, or use like a toothpaste and brush with it
Can squeeze in a ‘quickie’ whitening session almost anytime
Can use inside an Invisalign retainer to get a very tight fit against the teeth
Just like the tubes you get from the dentist but bigger and cheaper
cons: Could burn gums, causing blisters and irritation
Product may solidify after a few days

customer_reviews.title: Best price and quality 4 result
customer_reviews.text: I am obsessed with my teeth and I wish I took a before picture because the change over the last 3 days was super crazy. For the price and the amount that you get there is no doubt I will order it again
customer_reviews.author: Shalyn Woodham

customer_reviews.title: Brighter and whiter, easily
customer_reviews.text: The gel was super easy to use -- I just put a very small amount in tooth trays I bought separately. Be careful not to put too much, it might cause irritation to your gums. Very strong and quick whitening, I think I erased 15 years of coffee!
customer_reviews.author: lrae

customer_reviews.title: Great deal and good directions
customer_reviews.text: Great deal on whitening. Note that trays aren't included. Clear instructions. Photo is after 3 whitening sessions.
customer_reviews.author: Pete Schmidt

customer_reviews.title: Whitens teeth and may not expire!
customer_reviews.text: Years back, I ordered something like this from a late night TV ad. That product came with useless, open, undefined “trays” which you’re supposed to use as retainers. Had my dentist take a mold from my teeth and construct properly fitting, flexible plastic trays which hold the gel in the correct position. If you’re going to get this product, you’ll need exactly those, so do that first. Anyway, I don’t often use it but I did again the other day. This has been in my refrigerator - for years - and still works! But my dentist has been giving me new tubes of whitener, free of charge, with every cleaning. Yours might do that, too; you might not need this.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Foxmore

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and effective.
customer_reviews.text: I found the gel easy to use and effective. I already have a set of trays which were custom molded to my teeth by my dentist, so be aware that you must provide trays to hold the gel in place while it works to whiten your teeth. Good results for me. My teeth are not severely stained but I drink a lot of tea and coffee. I plan to use one syringe every month to keep them whiter between my dental visits.
customer_reviews.author: Charmed I'm Sure

customer_reviews.title: Savings that sparkle!
customer_reviews.text: This product is just like what the get at dentist. You need teeth trays which I'm sure you can find on Amazon. I have teeth trays my dentist made me and they give me free gel but it doesn't last long enough between visits so I wanted to order online. This stuff is affordable and you really get a lot of product! Highly recommend to anyone who likes white teeth
customer_reviews.author: Shonna Clark

customer_reviews.title: Clearly whitens
customer_reviews.text: This stuff really whitens the teeth. I use my clear retainer and put just a bit of the gel on my teeth with a q-tip. I then keep my retainer in for about 15 minutes. You need to do several treatments in a row for a few days to really see some whitening though. So stay consistent. Great product for great price.
customer_reviews.author: Teddy

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: I have been ordering tooth whitening gel from Amazon for about 6 years now. I have never been let down. This product lightens fast. It is not runny. It is easy to apply. I have trays from my dentist that are a perfect mold for my teeth, that were used for whitening in the past. My dentist gave me these trays to whiten at home. I always get very good results. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Michele Cr

customer_reviews.title: The real deal at a great price!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Used today for 10 min and can see a remarkable difference! I have a personalized tray from about 10 years ago, and used opulesence during that time. I had gum irritation, and the product amount was very small. This product caused no gum irritation, taste is fine, and produced results! I don't usually post reviews, but when a product impresses me, I have to post!
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany J Harris

customer_reviews.title: Affordable and works like it advertised
customer_reviews.text: I liked the applicator syringe. Easy to use. I liked the thickness off the gel. It stayed in my tray and did not run out. It works well. I don’t smoke or drink coffee so my teeth are pretty white to begin with. Had not bleached my teeth the past year and used your product for a month and a friend noticed the difference. Also it’s very affordable. I had always bought bleach from my dentist for a lot more money. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: William Evans

customer_reviews.title: This stuff is amazing, just like the tubes I got from my ...
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is amazing, just like the tubes I got from my dentist but so much bigger and cheaper! After only one treatment and my teeth are two colors whiter. I would definitely recommend getting the blue sensitive treatment, because after a couple uses you will find your teeth get really sensitive.
customer_reviews.author: Bailey

customer_reviews.title: Awesome. However
customer_reviews.text: Rocks. Awesome. However, I do use very thin trays that I had made at dentist. I would advise anyone using heavy bleach to Google "sensitivity" There are things to do before & after to keep that at bay. For good at home bleaching, you must be committed and do correct before & after care
customer_reviews.author: Zillabreeze

customer_reviews.title: Good tips
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product at a great price. It's very strong so use only a tiny bit. I found using a Q tip to smear it around the mouth piece reduces the amount that oozes out onto my gums. That really smarts . I also rinse my mouth before and after with an antacid. That reduces the sting a lot
customer_reviews.author: Wood Rat IV

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality product
customer_reviews.text: Very surprised with the positive reviews Not very pleased with this bleaching product. I’ve used others brands many times in the past. Example would be Day White by Discuss Dental. All bleaching products should have foaming action. This is how you know a product is working. -(stain lifting) Currently Im on day 3 of bleaching. And I don't see the usual results. I was a dental sales rep for 13 years. With this knowledge I can say my thoughts are accurate. Don’t waste your money. Buy syringes with 2 barrels that mix the carrier (gel) with the peroxide.
customer_reviews.author: vince

customer_reviews.title: The other reviews weren't lying
customer_reviews.text: My teeth were literally browned with red wine stains after too many drunken nights falling asleep without brushing them. Gross stuff really but man, I wish I'd taken a before and after. I even told my boyfriend I should take a before before the first use just in case it worked that fast (I had my doubts and figured there'd be time to get one before the next few uses). well, nope there wasn't. My teeth were immediately like 3 shades whiter. I'm so impressed. I think it's even better than the stuff my dentist gave me. And there's like 10x the amount! Look no further, this is a great product
customer_reviews.author: Tblood

customer_reviews.title: Can’t Recommend
customer_reviews.text: Only received two syringes of product in package. I don’t have extra sensitive teeth, but this burned and was uncomfortable after just two minutes. I think the solution is too strong to tolerate. I can’t tell if it worked or not. I tried 3 times for as long as I could stand it and really could not tell any difference. It may just need longer to work but I gave up on it.
customer_reviews.author: J. Davis

customer_reviews.title: Not Hydrogen Carbamide just at 10ML of 35% of nothing that will whiten teeth
customer_reviews.text: Never says Carbamide in the advertisement. I got hustled. I saw the 35% and assumed hydrogen Carbamide because what else would it be referring too. If you looking for hight strength Hydrogen Carbamide this isn't it. It doesn't bubble on teeth and doesn't even hurt gums. I'm going to finish trying this but bet my money it won't do anything. I'll reupdate in a few days.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Harsh on the gums
customer_reviews.text: This is a good price for this product. My dentist was charging me 3X more for nearly the same thing. It does whiten teeth but the drawback for me is it is very harsh on my gums. Don't leave this product on your teeth for longer than advised. Even though I followed all instructions and rinsed very carefully after each use, I still developed sores on my gums.
customer_reviews.author: V. Moss

customer_reviews.title: Great value and works good
customer_reviews.text: This is a great value for your money. My husband and I both used this in preparation for our wedding photos and got sparkly white teeth. You can use with or without the light, the light just makes it work faster for those people who are impatient. The measurements make it easy to disperse just the right amount of product for each whitening session. Note, depending on the stains on your teeth and personal preference, you will need to apply more than one treatment.
customer_reviews.author: RDRckmywrld

customer_reviews.title: Used all of it and all I notice is teeth ...
customer_reviews.text: Used all of it and all I notice is teeth sensitivity and sore gums. My teeth barely got a shed whiter, will not purchase again
customer_reviews.author: Preston119

customer_reviews.title: Not 35%, potentially no peroxide at all!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using Opalescence 35% for several years. This has no reaction once it comes in contact with the teeth and has no noticeable whitening. Opalescence will have a slight bubbling effect once it comes in contact with the teeth and has a tingling sensation....and it actually whitens. Go ahead and take a chance with this cheap @#$%, but its just not worth it....not worth anything really.
customer_reviews.author: MegaDave

customer_reviews.title: This stuff is magic. Works so quickly and makes ...
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is magic. Works so quickly and makes teeth so white. I have retainers from when I had braces and I just put some of this gel inside the retainer and will put the retainers in my mouth for about 30 mins and when I take them off I already notice my teeth got a lot whiter. Fair warning, though..sometimes the gel will seep up out of the retainer and get on the roof of my mouth behind my front teeth and it does sting so just be careful with it!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Allenwood

customer_reviews.title: Strongest one I’ve had!
customer_reviews.text: This gel is the quickest working gel I have had. It is very powerful and if you are like me and have had other whitening gels for your trays you will quickly realize how strong it is. Past gels take three or more applications before seeing a clear difference, but this one took only two. One word of caution: follow their suggestion of rubbing a little petroleum jelly on your gums before applying the product. It is strong enough that if you leave it on for a little too long, it may irritate your gums. This is the perfect gel to get whitened teeth quickly.
customer_reviews.author: S. M. Akin

customer_reviews.title: Burns! Dangerous!
customer_reviews.text: Holy hell this crap is HORRIBLE. It will literally eat away at your gums if you leave it on for more than a minute. Idk what's in this but i seriously doubt it's safe because it burns so bad. And this is coming from someone who has used plenty of tooth whitening products without an issue. I had to remove it and rinse my mouth repeatedly to get it to stop burning.
customer_reviews.author: laDida123

customer_reviews.title: Do not waste your money
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this because I wanted hydrogen peroxide as represented, what I received says hydrogen and /or carbamide peroxide which does not work for my teeth. Not happy because of misrepresenting ingredients. Update: sending it back as much as I hate to return anything this stuff whatever it is has stained my teeth with brown spots and streaks!
customer_reviews.author: ET Maria

customer_reviews.title: So glad I stumbled across this item! I love saving money!
customer_reviews.text: My teeth were amazingly whiter after only 3 applications! I bought the moldable trays to my order so that I could place the gel in the trays. I should have listened to others’ reviews, though. I started out my first time for 10 minutes, second time (second day) for 15 minutes and third time for 30 minutes. My teeth are still a little sensitive and it’s been 2 days since I did it last. All in all, this is a great purchase! My whole family can use it at a fraction of the cost for name brand whitening strips!
customer_reviews.author: Holly H.

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Has no taste, and seems to be working pretty well. I have sensitive teeth and it does not hurt at all. I haven’t seen a DRAMATIC change but that also may be because I forget to whiten at night and so these photos are seven days apart, whitening every night.
customer_reviews.author: Elle Shelvey

customer_reviews.title: Gel is ok but can be better. Update: Gel is useless.
customer_reviews.text: Gel works but makes teeth sensitive. The cover is not good though. Update: After several uses, I am convinced this is more of a placebo gel! I have tried a 22% gel from a different vendor and worked effectively. With this gel, I got no noticeable whitening results other that very sensitive teeth. Changed my review from 3 starts to 1 star.
customer_reviews.author: jadi amakran

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied customer🙂
customer_reviews.text: Overall this is a great product and the cost is very good especially given the quantity that is provided with this order. These syringes are large and there is not an application tip included. So this makes it a bit difficult putting the gel inside of my bleaching trays. I end up with a big mess. So I guess maybe these are refills since there is not an applicator tip for the syringes. Maybe I didn’t read enough. But I will buy again because it’s a great value!
customer_reviews.author: Miz Shawty

customer_reviews.title: Same gel better price
customer_reviews.text: This is a good value as advertised, gel is just as strong as opalescent and you get four big 10 mL syringes instead of a bunch of teensy finicky little ones. None of them taste any good but exactly as advertised this stuff does the same job for a fraction of the cost. They should throw in a couple little tip applicator’s because squirting straight from a regular hospital syringe isn’t as precise
customer_reviews.author: Sean G

customer_reviews.title: Test before use . Caused gum and teeth tingling
customer_reviews.text: Like many others I was looking for something vin between using strip whitening and the dentist office. I used this for the first time this morning. My gums started burning and now my teeth tingle. While my teeth look whiter, it's not worth the weirdness. I will now stick to strips, may take longer but I know my gums will not be affected
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Gel whitens
customer_reviews.text: I like the time to use it is around 30 minutes. Some whiteners take several hours. My dentist noticed I had used a whitener! A little difficult to get gel to flow out of the syringe which causes the gel to come out to fast. None of these taste good.
customer_reviews.author: Penny

customer_reviews.title: you get so much more for your money!
customer_reviews.text: I have sensitive teeth and sometimes when using trays my teeth hurt for a few hours afterwards, so prefer the slower method of mixing with my toothpaste and brushing. However with so many whitening kits you get so little that you use it up too quickly to see results. But these syringes are much bigger that most on the market and will last long enough to see results. I’ve already seen results, even on the stubborn stains around my gumline on my molars!
customer_reviews.author: Mary Mack

customer_reviews.title: White Teeth
customer_reviews.text: I have been using whitening gel for about 15 years. I like to use the larger tubes because one will last during the whitening process. It is not overly sensitive to my gums and it stays as a gel in the tubes until I am ready to order again. Works great and people always comment on how white my teeth are!
customer_reviews.author: Jeri G

customer_reviews.title: Total waste of time and money
customer_reviews.text: There was absolutely no change to my teeth using as directed. Total waste of money. My teeth are already white so I was hoping to make them brighter and maintain. Super disapppointed. Also, too much comes out of tube so it goes all over.
customer_reviews.author: Christine L.

customer_reviews.title: Better with dentist made bleaching trays than the ones you mold yourself
customer_reviews.text: It's not a miracle whitener for me but it did help a bit. I started off leaving it on only a short amount of time and then built it up gradually. It wasn't until I left it on for 40 minutes with dentist made bleaching trays that I really noticed a difference. My teeth were sensitive the next day even using a remineralization gel afterwards.
customer_reviews.author: Adrea Taryn

customer_reviews.title: Very Strong
customer_reviews.text: I was previously using a 22% formula that I got from my dentist along with custom trays. This product gives way more for your money, and it certainly does it's job as far as whitening goes. On the downside, however, the larger syringes are more difficult to get a small, steady bead out of. Also, I have found that while I never had any problems with the 22%, the 35% formula may be too strong for me. It burns my gums. I keep it on for about 15 mins per use.
customer_reviews.author: Faithful

customer_reviews.title: Whitening no-go
customer_reviews.text: Sadly, I don’t think this product works. I’ve used the syringes for years but decided to try a new brand. I’ve used it 4-5 days a week for the last month and can’t tell a difference. I’ve even tried leaving them in for longer than recommended. I have very sensitive teeth and this is the only product that hasn’t bothered me. I assume this is because it is not working to whiten my teeth.
customer_reviews.author: JD2

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: I hate leaving bad reviews because I know it’s hard to build a product and make it last. I was disappointed with this. Have used multiple times with very little difference to my color. Have used other brands where you see a difference from the first use. The gel itself is really thick and doesn’t come out in a thin line as recommended. It globs in one place and you have to smooth it out. Doesn’t have a taste and didn’t make my teeth sensitive so that’s a plus but I wasn’t happy overall
customer_reviews.author: Alyte

customer_reviews.title: Great value and even better product!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product because it works so well and I can get 2 uses out of each syringe. My teeth are sensitive so I only use it once a week, but the product works so well that I can get away with it. My number one suggestion is to make sure your teeth are brushed and have been dry for about 10 minutes to get optimal results. It is absolutely a great value and even better product!
customer_reviews.author: EricaRVA

customer_reviews.title: Not seeing results.
customer_reviews.text: I have to say. I don't know if I got a bad batch or what but I just haven't been getting the results I usually get. I usually buy the opalescense teeth whitener from Amazon but thought I would give this a try with it being cheaper. I usually see a change immediately after the first use but haven't seen it at all after a few uses now. Will continue to use and update the review if I see any change.
customer_reviews.author: MsKateydid

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: They never sent me the tips for the syringes when I emailed that they were missing they responded that they would mail them, never received them. I have to use my finger tips to spread the product on my tray. The whitening strength is a disappointment after using daily for three weeks I don’t see much improvement . You get what you pay for and it’s obvious that this is a quack company.
customer_reviews.author: Stef

customer_reviews.title: Would be nice if they said something about Not providing the
customer_reviews.text: Haven’t used it yet but was surprised at the amount you get the syringes are huge the only problem is they don’t come with a tip they come with the screw off cap so I’m not exactly sure how you are supposed to be able to put it in your mouth guard and use it??? Would be nice if they said something about Not providing the tips
customer_reviews.author: t.b.

customer_reviews.title: A cost effective gel
customer_reviews.text: The whitening gel is not the best on the market for whitening teeth. However, if you are looking for a cost-effective way to whiten compared to products like Crest Strips. As a caveat, I did have a whitening tray already that was made by my dentist's office and this product does not come with any trays. I found it best to apply the gel on the front tooth side sparingly and then paint the tooth side of the tray with a Q-tip. Always use the most minimal amount of gel possible. The pain on my gums is still very painful if I accidentally use too much gel; even after several weeks of using it.
customer_reviews.author: Michael B.

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work for me
customer_reviews.text: Not sure if I just got a bad batch, or what, but this stuff did absolutely nothing for my teeth. I've bleached previously, but it's been a while and needed to freshen up. I filled my trays (from the dentist) per the instructions and wore them for over an hour. No sensitivity, but no change. Returning.
customer_reviews.author: ksmack

customer_reviews.title: Yes!
customer_reviews.text: I have custom trays for my teeth that I use this with. It does give a little spotting on the teeth which is usually gone by morning if done at night. I try my best not to get it on my gums which adds to sensitivity but other than that, I notice a difference even after the first use
customer_reviews.author: Kristi

customer_reviews.title: A Few Things to Know
customer_reviews.text: After much research, here's what you need to know to realize the benefits of this very good value. #1 after putting the gel in your trays, WAIT 15 MIN. #2 Then put the trays in your mouth for about an hour. Don't gob in in the tray or it will get all over your gums and you'll be uncomfortable (burning). Just use a moderate amount for your mouth. My teeth were so yellow and it only took a few times to get the desired result. When I followed the directions that came with the product, I used it for 6 mos without results at all.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen A. Carnahan

customer_reviews.title: A bit disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I followed the directions and read the reviews but my teeth didn't whiten as much as I expected, in fact, very little. The syringe opening is too wide and it overfills. I read where some people find it easier to apply with a q-tip, so I'm doing that now. But really disappointed with the results.
customer_reviews.author: Francine

customer_reviews.title: works great!
customer_reviews.text: I'ev been using this for years. my teeth were so white for my wedding 4 years ago after using this whitening gel that people joked they could see my teeth in the dark. I stopped using it while I was pregnant with my 2 babies but I've started using it again and bam! my teeth are returning to that beatiful white they were 4 years ago. Love this stuff! I also use a remineralization gel afterwards to keep my teeth from getting over sensative.
customer_reviews.author: Theycallmemom

customer_reviews.title: works great
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: Did the review and was promised a free pack. It has not been delivered as of today and so when you get the postcard in the mail asking you to do the review for your free gel, it is not going to happen. This product does the job, my only suggestion is to go slow when filling the trays. The small ribbon that is recommended will prevent the gum burn. So if you follow the directions, you should be happy. I am.
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: SenAllis Cosmetics Whitening Gel
customer_reviews.text: I really like how the actually whitening gel made my white. This product really works! My friend who is a dental hygienist suggested this product on amazon prime instead of buying it at high cost at my dentist office. The reason why I gave this product 4 stars out of 5 is because it not easy to use. Meaning that it doesn't come out of the tube smooth and easy. It's actually kind of thick. You have to squeeze hard and sometime more comes out than expected to be careful.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Speed

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I ran out of my Dental Hygienist provided Opalescence. The Dentist office wanted to charge me 3x's the cost of this Senallis gel. I looked over the reviews for this gel and figured that I would give it a try. This Senallis whitening gel is a great value for the price! I would recommend having your Dentist's office make a mold of your teeth. A fitted set of trays will only increase the effectiveness of the Senallis gel. You do not require much of this gel to attain positive results. Don't overdo it as gum irritation may occur. Use as you would with other whiteners. Attain the results you want. Then continue to use as necessary to maintain whiteness.
customer_reviews.author: Philip Insalaco

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used this gel off and on for a few years. Works as well as anything I purchased at the dentist for a fraction of the price. I maintain the whitening effect by mixing a small amount of the gel daily with my toothpaste when I brush. My dentist always comments how great my teeth look! Update 5/15/2020 Still using this gel - a dab with my toothpaste in the morning to keep my teeth whitened. No sensitivity, great results!
customer_reviews.author: Patti NP

customer_reviews.title: Be careful not to get ripped off by your dentist ...
customer_reviews.text: Be careful not to get ripped off by your dentist. They normally give you a small dosage of the teeth whitening gel so that you have to keep coming back for more and more and it takes a long time two whiten your teeth. My dentist offered me the same whitening gel for an in house visit at around $200. Amazon's price eight dollars.
customer_reviews.author: mary moss

customer_reviews.title: Nice teeth whitening kit
customer_reviews.text: They work well and will definitely whiten your teeth within a week. Only thing is if you don’t use them constantly they will turn to liquid in storage and you’ll have to throw away. Better to buy one or two at most
customer_reviews.author: Steve C.

customer_reviews.title: Not great,
customer_reviews.text: They give you a ton for the money but I don’t think it’s worth it at all. It caused some tooth pain almost immediately after applying, and when it wasn’t painful it didn’t work, after following daily use instructions for 2 and a half weeks I saw no difference.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.text: I was always very apprehensive about these over-the-counter, super-discounted gels - but after using this gel, I am sold. It made a massive difference in whitening my teeth. I used it religiously for about a month, once per day, for 30 minutes each day. I had family members commenting about how white my teeth looked (without them knowing I was using the product), and I can tell from pictures that it has made a difference. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Great value and quality
customer_reviews.text: This product is such a great value for the price, and the quality is fantastic. I'm a daily coffee drinker, and a smoker, and this product has really helped to lighten the stains on my teeth. I'm confident that as time progresses, the stains will lighten to my preference. There is no stinging if you use Vaseline on your gum line, or purchase one of those plastic tools that keeps your mouth open (I did) expressly for this purpose. I don't want to post a photo, because I'm embarrassed of my "before". Give it a try, it's worth a shot, to see how much it will lighten your teeth.
customer_reviews.author: Undisclosed Name

customer_reviews.title: Not effective on my teeth
customer_reviews.text: This was cheaper than what I was using (auraglow) so I bought it. This is my first time whitening my teeth. Was getting results fast, then when I switched to this brand, results stalled. Switched back, results again. Didn't work for me, I saw no whitening.
customer_reviews.author: Emkay

customer_reviews.title: They work, you just need a delivery system
customer_reviews.text: You get a lotta gel for the money. I experimented with Q-Tip application first but it was spotty. Wound up putting a bit on my index finger and applying it directly. If you wash your hands afterwards there is no staining. Using in tandem with a blue light to enhance results. After only a few days of use it is already making a difference
customer_reviews.author: Andrew J. Holland

customer_reviews.title: Be careful when using.
customer_reviews.text: This product works. Absolutely! However, it will whitening your gums (even to the point that they will look bruised) and your teeth will be sensitive (for a day or two). I apply vaseline with a q-tip before and after. Results are beautiful though.
customer_reviews.author: Jessie

customer_reviews.title: no pain, whiter teeth
customer_reviews.text: i have never used any whitening formula for my teeth, i dont drink coffee or soda i dont smoke. i bought these to see if indeed i would see a difference. after the first time i noticed it. and have been ever since. no tooth sensitivety no pain, easy to use just perfectly white, not overwhite teeth. i give this product a 10 and in the honesty of of writing a review, i will say the absolute only thing would be that when you first push syringe to get gel, be careful because alot will pour out at once. after that youll get the hang of it
customer_reviews.author: art aguilar

customer_reviews.title: Not 35%
customer_reviews.text: I have 22% gel that I get from my dentist...3 syringes for $65. I ordered these because it says it’s 35%strength .. my ass .it’s not any stronger than the 22% that I have! I would know because I’m used to using 22% and I have zero sensitivity to it
customer_reviews.author: Renee

customer_reviews.title: It works.
customer_reviews.text: I have tried other teeth whitening gel in the past with mediocre results. But this product works, there is a noticeable improvement already after a few times of use. But you need to keep using it to maintain the improved level of whiteness: I took a break for a week when I had the flu and I think my teeth lost some the acquired whiteness. Still, I can highly recommend this product. Doesn't hurt my gums unless I use too much.
customer_reviews.author: Christer Johansson

customer_reviews.title: No nozzle makes this product difficult to use.
customer_reviews.text: Product seems to work well and the tubes are very large. One major downside is that there is no applicator nozzle and it makes dispensing the product extremely difficult and messy with too much waste. Seems like a simple problem to fix since the syringe is designed to accept a nozzle/ needle. Otherwise good product.
customer_reviews.author: Marty

customer_reviews.title: You should use all of the gel to get the best results!
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this product especially the price you cannot beat. I was skeptical at first but was blown away by the results of this whitening gel. This gel is tough enough to clean any stain off from your teeth. I would recommend to anyone. It will burn a little on your gums at first but just remove the tray and wipe any excess gel away from that area and you will surpass the little pain at first. I recommend 10 mins and I like to use mine before I go to bed so it keeps working while you sleep.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My teeth were a few shades whiter in a few short steps!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff works very well for whitening. The flavor was pleasant. The only down side is that its a bit strong and my gums became a little sensitive so I just used the product every 3 days and Wa-la....beautiful white teeth in 2 weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth D Bingaman

customer_reviews.title: Does what it needs to
customer_reviews.text: The syringes really are large (and man do they emphasize that) and it seems to be decent gel. Four of these syringes should last me a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Carson Mueller

customer_reviews.title: Love that it acts so quickly
customer_reviews.text: I really like that it takes only 10 minutes for an application. I already have trays and used them a few days in a row, and my teeth really whitened up. I am a coffee drinker, so that tends to stain my teeth. They are bright and shiny now.
customer_reviews.author: Janet Kasuboske

customer_reviews.title: Great Value, No issues
customer_reviews.text: This product clearly whitens the teeth, and is very easy to use. After using it everyday for a few weeks, I have been using it about once per week to maintain the whitening, and it works well! I have been using for a while now, and have no issues with sensitivity to the gel. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Works great! Ordered multiple times.
customer_reviews.text: Easily my favorite way (and the most effective/cheapest way I have found) to whiten my teeth consistently. I use it with a different mouth tray that I own... I put the gel on a toothbrush and then rub it on my teeth, avoiding my gums as much as possible. After a few days of consistent application, my teeth are as white as they could possibly get.
customer_reviews.author: A. Vincent

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: I've only had for 3 days now and definitely can tell a big difference! I went and purchased the mouth guard used for sports and I use that..works like a charm! Will definitely buy more a little goes a long way!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Total scam!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is a total scam. It doesn’t work at all. Buy name brand stuff with lower percentages and you will be much much happier. I don’t even know what this actually is but it doesn’t whiten at all!
customer_reviews.author: ShaSha

customer_reviews.title: Sensitivity. Use small amounts at first for short times.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve only used one of the four tubes so far. I believe it has lighten my teeth up a lot! There nothing better than a white, bright smile! I do have trays in which I place the gel for about 20 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Anika Estioko

customer_reviews.title: Perfection + Bargain
customer_reviews.text: The syringes are huge and the whitening power is fantastic. I used trays & a blue light that I already had. Use these syringes as the perfect refill to any kit you already have. You need your own trays, but the blue light isn’t necessary, it just speeds the process.
customer_reviews.author: CHRISTI

customer_reviews.title: Works Very Well
customer_reviews.text: I've used teeth whitening gels in the past but hadn't for several years. As others have mentioned, you get an awful lot for your money. There's a noticeable difference once I've used the gel vs. going weeks without. I plan to buy this product again as it's good value and works well. By the way, there has been mention of the gel possibly causing irritation to the gum line. I have very sensitive gums and have had no problems with this.
customer_reviews.author: RB

customer_reviews.title: Great product, great price!
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with this product. It seems to be exactly what I was previously getting from my dentist. Great product at a great price. I will definitely continue to buy.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money for me no whitening after 4 uses
customer_reviews.text: I have used this 4 times after running out of my other brand that was a kit and does not offer refills I saw no difference in my teeth . This for me is an absowaste of money and my time. It had such good reviews that i hoped it would be a good substitute for another brand sold in a kit here on amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Riverland

customer_reviews.title: The Generic Teeth Bleaching Whitening was delivered right away. ...
customer_reviews.text: The Generic Teeth Bleaching Whitening was delivered right away. I tried it out that day, and my teeth seemed a little bit whiter. Within about five days, the spots where my teeth had been kindof yellow were much more white. After using the teeth whitening gel for about two weeks, I have noticied a difference in the whiteness of my teeth. Thank you so much!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley L.

customer_reviews.title: Professional level whitening
customer_reviews.text: I can't believe how well this works for the price. I lined the inside of my invisalign with the gel and left on for about half an hour, and it was a whole shade whiter JUST after the first time. Every single time was just as effective, meaning I was able to get a professional level white smile in less than 2 weeks. Definitely recommend if you have some trays you can apply the gel to.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Banks

customer_reviews.title: Not as advertised
customer_reviews.text: I've used 35% teeth whitening agent before and this product is not 35%. An actual 35% will burn the gums fairly quickly if allowed to ooze out of the trays. This product does nothing to the gums. I'd say it's more like a 5%. Just lots of gel and very little if any whitener. Very little whitening effect. I'm throwing this away. I'm going back to the real thing: Opalescence PF Mint 35% Teeth Whitening.
customer_reviews.author: clayton satterlee

customer_reviews.title: If your gums are sensitive, DO NOT USE
customer_reviews.text: My gums are a little more than "irritated". Every inch of my top gums are red, inflamed, and swollen in some parts. I don't know if I can get a refund but now I have to pay for a Dr visit. Very unhappy.
customer_reviews.author: April C.

customer_reviews.title: Love a bright white smile
customer_reviews.text: I love having the whitest teeth possible and SeAllis definitely helps with that. I do think the syringe needs to have a smaller opening as I have to be careful not to get too much gel in the tray. A couple of times I had top much which caused the gel to overflow, and I immediately felt a burning sensation on my gums.
customer_reviews.author: mhaich

customer_reviews.title: Don’t order
customer_reviews.text: It’s a large syringe full of water. Yes, literally - water.
customer_reviews.author: Jodi Woodruff

customer_reviews.title: Worked great and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I already had professionally done trays so I get a nice tight fit when using this product. This gel works great and does not burn my gums like many others do. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: John B

customer_reviews.title: best whitener best price
customer_reviews.text: This gel is the best whitener and you cant get a better price. You have to have your own mold to put the gel in but that is also an inexpensive purchase. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: Fast whitening without pain
customer_reviews.text: I have very sensitive teeth and have been looking for something to whiten my teeth without the pain, and this really works! I would recommend this product to anyone wanting whiter teeth! Fast results.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Whitens gently without irritation!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great whitening gel! By the second use i started to seeing the results that i was looking for. I had no reaction to the gel. I only used it 2-3 time a week for 20 minutes at a time. Definitely would recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Ruggini

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: I'm writing this review for a promo I received in the mail. I wouldn't have taken the promo offer had the product not worked as expected. It did work.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonian

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Product is easy to use. I like the size of the dispensing syringes as they are a comfortable size to hold in your hand. Most of all, this gel is effective at whitening your teeth.
customer_reviews.author: Book Worm

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is the bomb and really helps keep my teeth looking great despite all the coffee I drink. Lol It works better than any of the expensive stuff I've tried and there is enough product to last a long time. A little goes a long way!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Burn my gums and teeth
customer_reviews.text: Wow, this product is painful and will burn your gums almost immediately. It stained mine for a period of time and it hurt. We wasted money on it and threw them away. I wouldn’t buy again, it wasn’t worth the damage.
customer_reviews.author: Review King

customer_reviews.title: Painful - bleached gums
customer_reviews.text: This was incredibly painful and bleached my gums in less than five minutes even with using just a thin strip in a tray. Wouldn’t recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these thinking they would be just like the ones from the dentist, and they are!! They do not include a tray but other than that I already saw results after one use... I brushed my teeth with regular toothpaste then with the gel a little bit then use my trays for less than about 10 minutes and they already looked pretty white. To me these are way easier than white strips. I had no irritation at all.
customer_reviews.author: Alexa

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: After 4 uses my wife noticed that my teeth were whiter. I never told her I had purchased product and when she did notice that they were whiter she thought I had spent a lot of money to whiten my teeth. She could not believe what I had paid because just about all teeth whitening products are overpriced and a ripoff at the dentist. Took less than one syringe to get great results.
customer_reviews.author: Whitt

customer_reviews.title: Worked well
customer_reviews.text: I was having new crowns and wanted my teeth to be as white as possible for the match. So I got this and used it and I saw good results in just a couple weeks. I am very happy with this.
customer_reviews.author: AshertopiA

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Good
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, I put it on my clear retainers to whiten instead of mouth guards, seems to work pretty well. I suggest using a little bit your first time and not going the full 15 minutes as my teeth got very sensitive. However, as a used it regularly it went away. Did not see results immediately, say it after about 4 regular uses.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: This gel really works! The 35% was recommended to me by a dentist. If you do the work, shape the teeth molds and use it for the recommended duration and frequency it will work! It's not rocket science or magic it's peroxide and SenAllis has the best!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works well and great value
customer_reviews.text: I've bought different gels in the past. These syringes are at least 3x larger with more gel and not extra $$$! It didn't burn my gums likes some of the other products. There are a few great pointers on the application that's included with the package. The product does come out a little quickly because it's a bit larger syringe. But, I still love using it and the results are great!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Very gentle
customer_reviews.text: I like how this works gently without bothering my gums. The individual syringes also seem more hygenic and are easy to use. Will continue to use this product.
customer_reviews.author: KBThomas

product_meta.title: Four 10mL Syringes SenAllis Cosmetics Teeth Whitening Gel, 40mL 35% Gel Syringes, Fast & More Effective Than Teeth Whitening Strips, Refills Gel Compatible With Hi Smile Teeth Whitening Kit
product_meta.description:
Color:Clear

Ready to feel the full effects from SenAllis Cosmetics RapidEffects teeth whitening gel?

Fast, Effective Teeth Whitening Gel that will save you money over the long run, ditch the teeth whitening strips, and forget the expensive name brand, and private label sellers on Amazon who mark up the price way above retail value. We provide you with the only part that is essential to whitening your teeth, the gel.



Don't use whitening strips, ever, period.

Teeth Whitening strips are a complete waste of your money, let's use this analogy, think about the epoxy on the back of a sticker, versus a small container full of epoxy. If you had the option of being charged $40.00 for a sticker, or you could make your own stickers for $10.00, and make 50x more, we think you already get what we're saying. Our teeth whitening gel provides a 30:1 ratio, that means for every pair of whitening strips you use, you could get the equivalent of 30 treatments from a single syringe of our gel.



Well wait, don't I need teeth whitening trays?

Sure, you could get teeth whitening trays, it would improve your teeth whitening dramatically, however for the best results you want to get hard plastic trays. BUT WAIT! Our gel is sticky, and will stay on your teeth just like a whitening strip, so your STILL getting better results from our teeth whitening gel than you would EVER get from whitening strips.



Will this teeth whitening gel work with my hiSmile kit?

Your hiSmile teeth whitening kit's gel won't last you more than 5 sessions, sad, but true. hiSmile only gives you SMALL 3mL syringes, we give you LARGE 10mL syringes, forget the hype marketing that they've used to pull you in to buy their over priced products, get real results, get a real months supply worth of gel, and save yourself money!



Do I need one of those weird teeth whitening lights?

No, that teeth whitening light does absolutely NOTHING for your teeth. The one's at your dentist's office are actually useful because they help to break down the teeth whitening gel which releases the oxidative power, or rather the component in the gel that whitens your teeth.



How to use our gel?

Our gel can be easily applied to your pre-existing teeth whitening trays, or simply use our gel like a toothpaste and brush with it.
feature_bullets: Huge 10mL Syringes that will last you 5x longer than other brands sold on Amazon
Fast, Effective, Easy, Whitening Gel that is compatible with teeth whitening kits, and all other private label brands. More Effective and larger cost savings than whitening strips
Gets rid of stubborn enamel/tooth stains, simply apply to the teeth whitening gel to a tray, or to your toothbrush
ver 70 Applications of Whitening Gel, 20x the amount of gel in a single versus a whitening strip
Tooth Whitening Gel Manufacturered directly within the USA. Don't settle for cheap Chinese immitations that have been sitting in a warehouse for months
